bibl.title: The Encyclopedia of Ancient History.
bibl.note: Area Editor for Greco-Roman Egypt: Paul Schubert. - Pp. ix-lxvi: List of entries [over 5,000]; - lxxvi-cxxxiv: List of contributors [1,827]. - The electronic form of the EAH will continue to add new articles, indeed new areas of the ancient world.
bibl.seg: Roger S. Bagnall, Kai Brodersen, Craige B. Champion, Andrew Erskine & Sabine R. Huebner (edd.), The Encyclopedia of Ancient History.
Malden, MA - Oxford - Chichester, Wiley-Blackwell, 2013, 4Â°, cxliv-7492 pp. en 13 voll., tabl., cartes, plans, figg. ISBN 978-1-4051-7935-5. $2495.

Area Editor for Greco-Roman Egypt: Paul Schubert. - Pp. ix-lxvi: List of entries [over 5,000]; - lxxvi-cxxxiv: List of contributors [1,827]. - The electronic form of the EAH will continue to add new articles, indeed new areas of the ancient world.
